评论详情: Love the fit. Top is a great style

Got this on sale during Xmas week-only complaint is that the pants are too long but can be hemmed or cuffed. It's warm and will be good for traveling in the  winter with a layer or two underneath instead of a coat. Fits true to size.
I love it! Real comfortable and the material is just right for a cold winter day/night (dress up or casual) I want to order another color, I purchased black.

Love the quality and it fits perfect! Its thick material is nice for cool fall and winter weather. The pants have pockets, which I absolutely love, but there’s no drawstring. This sweatsuit has a very nice relaxed fit and it’s true to size. The length of the pants are perfect for me because I’m 5’8 so they’ll look great with sneakers and boots with a heel without looking too short.

I needed comfortable warm travel sets and chose this one. I ordered a Large upon Amazon’s recommendation based on my previous clothing orders. It is too large for me  . It kept me warm but the too large size made for a bulky look. Also the pants really could use a drawstring. I wore a thermal set underneath so the pants kept sliding down. At points the seat was 6” from my crotch. If the pants had a drawstring, I could have secured it better. Overall, order a size down.
Best set of season. I love how warm and soft this set is. Perfect thickness and looks great.
Top is perfect and bottom is too small. I went with their sizing chart.
Loved the top and work it with other pants.  The pants are super long, so if you are under 5’5, you will need to alter.  Otherwise an excellent lounge outfit

I wasn’t expecting much for $28 when I ordered this lounge set. The material is nice and thick. It’s soft. I washed it before I wore it and it washed up and dried beautifully. If you hate the cold like I do this is a must.

It is a heavier Sweat set! It’s great for me.. I live in Michigan. It’s 28 degrees today, I am getting more colors for everyday wear. (:  I have worn the top with leggings? It’s very nice looking! I put a thin Turtle neck underneath.. it’s so nice looking. I have to get use to the pants, only because I wear tight  Leggings.

I want to like this, but, I hate it. It’s fine weight wise, but it’s a funky, stiff material. Not nearly as warm as I hoped it would be. Nice color, but I feel and look like an Oompa Loompa in it. I’m 5’5” and weigh 122#. Makes me look 50#’s heavier. Just not flattering.
runs large.  i typically wear small ( 5'2 115 lbs)  I definitely needed an x-small, unfortunately unavailable
It is very nice! Thick and warm.
Great fit and so comfortable and warm
Comfy. Thick. Soft on the inside. Quality zipper. 10/10
I purchased the cream color and the coffee color and love them. Very comfortable.

评论概述: It’s very thick and warm if you like that.
评论详情: I wasn’t expecting it to be so thick and warm. Where I live it doesn’t get very cold so I will burn up in this. So I will be returning it. I bought a large and the top fits great but the pants are too long. I am 5’3. I can still wear the pants but they do touch the ground a little.
Good quality material and fits true to size.

3 stars because the length in the pants is not what is stated. They are extremely long. I also contacted the seller and they assured me they were smaller, but no. They are well made. Very thick sweatshirt material, and very warm. They wash well, too. These do fit a bit oversized. Wish they had an XS. I still kept my ensemble because I just had the sweatpants tailored.
The material is thick enough to keep you warm. I am 5'8 and the pants are just long enough, and I ordered a size up. I would purchase another color.
The fit is nice.  However, it is extremely thick.  Would be great for winter wear only.
Love the style A good quality
Fits well and true to size. Perfect outfit when it’s cool outside
I like how long the pants are. super cute for around the house and running errands
Comfy & Cozy. I Ordered this for my daughter but I think I'll go back and order one for me.

评论概述: Great shirt ,although a little heavier than I expected .I live in the gulf coast .
评论详情: I like the lines in the sweatshirt .i think the pants would look a lot better on a taller person. I'm only 5'3".

评论概述: If you want to look sloppy

Wife tried on and she looked like the Michelin Man. Very unflattering look . Too heavy and not comfortable
Pants were too short

If you're looking for a really WARM sweatsuit, this is the one for you. I can almost never wear it around the house because I end up sweating and I am always cold! That said, it's well-made and I like it, but it is too warm for me.

I normally wear an XS in pants and a S or M in tops, and I have long arms and legs. I ordered the S, and the pants fit great, roomy but still fit and long enough. The top was also plenty roomy, but the sleeves were too short. The set seemed like good quality, and it is very thick, heavyweight fleece
I like the fit and warmth. Perfect for fall or winter with a coat. Warm and cozy. Effortless style with the color selection. I went with cream looking color.

评论概述: Love wide leg style - very thick sweatsuit
评论详情: This is a very thick sweatsuit - it is definitely for brisk days outside.  It makes me feel a little thick - but the wide leg style of the pants at least gives it a trendier style.  The top and bottom match well (sometimes with 2 piece sets the colors are off a bit).  I'm just over 5', but the pants are not too long - which is a plus.  The top is a little hard to get on/off - more due to the thickness of the material.  I doubt I can wear a jacket with this sweatsuit - this will be worn more with a vest/scarf/hat.

his matching set is comfortable and stylish enough to wear around the house or running errands. The fabric is soft, but too heavy for fall-it is needed more in winter. The fit is casual but flattering. Overall, it's a decent set for lounging, though I’d recommend waiting to wear,
This two piece set is super comfy and washes well, what more could you want…oh wait also a great price

At 5’1,” I was relieved to learn these pants were not too long like regular-sized bottoms.  Of course, I usually wear shoes with a bit of a platform/height.  The legs also are straight, complementing my petite figure.As pictured, the top goes over my buttocks worn full-length.  Fortunately, the band kept this sweatshirt folded at the hips.  Also,  I’m not crazy about the ring on the metal zipper.  Just a personal preference.Fabric is a true sweatshirt material lined in fleece.  This suit is great for cooler weather.  I’m glad how true the color turned out.  One could never predict when buying online, yes?  Overall, a loose, casual and comfy outfit priced ok at 36 bucks.

I was looking for some more winter clothes for my daughters and hoped to find some two piece outfits which would make it easy to change into after practice or what not. This suit is very comfortable and she said that all day at school she is very comfortable. This is a breathable tracksuit, good ventilation. She loves that the matching sweatpants are included. I do find that this was designed very well and this has easy upkeep with the ability to machine wash. Based on a good experience, and how cute the set looks on my daughter- I do recommend this tracksuit to other consumers.

Perfect for the upcoming winter season. Big and baggy and soft, I see myself wearing this set all the time at home. Sweater pocket is soft but pants pockets is the material on the outside. It went through the wash and the dryer on low just fine. The inside is still soft with slight pebbling after the wash. The outside is still pristine, but I would rate it a 4 stars since I’m not sure of the long term quality after repeated washing
I am 5'1 and weigh 105#. Small was too big on me. I loved the warm fuzzy feel. Just didn't fit right
Great for at home or to travel in.
This is well made, and really quite nice looking. The material is soft and you can wear it as sepreates or as a set. Looks more expensive than it is!
Cute outfit really good material!

评论概述: Love this set, length is good!
评论详情: My favorite set that I have bought from Amazon! I’m  5’5 & weigh 137. I like my jogging sets loose but not real baggy. I bought a medium & the fit & length was good! Haven’t washed yet. Hope they hold up.

It looks so cozy and comfy in the pictures but when I put it on it looked awful.  Its way too baggy and there is an abundance of material that bunches up at my waist.  It feels cozy and warm but looks horrible.
This is a two piece sweater and sweatpants, great combination and color. Fits well and is plenty warm.
It’s a thick material so it’ll definitely keep you warm. I took one star off because it’s a little snug. I wish I would’ve sized up. But other than that it’s very nice.
Love ! Color was great and fits great too. Perfect for lounging or running errands.
Really soft and fits amazingly. My daughter is in love with the color and how soft and warm this set it. She says its her new favorite lounge wear for her dorm.

This is a nicer set than I had expected.  The pants are much heavier than expected.  They are not for warm or hot days.  She is waiting for cooler weather to test them out further.Overall, she likes this set and is happy to have it.
I love this outfit. They are thick, warm and cozy. Perfect for lounging and fine to wear out too.

评论概述: Super Soft and Perfect for Lounging or Errands!
评论详情: I recently purchased the Aleumdr Women’s 2 Piece Outfits Matching Sweat Sets, and I couldn’t be happier with my choice! The material is incredibly soft, making it the perfect outfit to lounge around the house or run errands comfortably. I’m 5’6" and 130 lbs, and the XS fits perfectly. The zip-up sweatshirt and sweatpants are both stylish and practical. Highly recommend this set for anyone looking for a cozy and versatile outfit!
She looks great in it. They are very comfortable.  Fabric feels good as well
This set is  great! Affordable and stylish. True to size.
Gorgeous green color and very comfortable sweat suit. Great for cooler mornings and evenings. So comfortable and nice soft material.  True to size. Looks and feels great on.
The fabric is heavy and warm. Fit is good. Whether or not it shrinks when washed is unknown but I hope it won't shrink too much. I bought 2 sets because of the fabric, cut, and fit.
Pants are long! Otherwise fit is great on top. Nice thick fabric.will be warm! Washes well. No shrinkage. I air dried. Stylish..

评论概述: Love It Good Budget Friendly Buy
评论详情: Good Budget Friendly Buy. I absolutely love it and washes wonderfully.
Really impressed for sure getting other colors
This outfit is very comfy! Well made of thick fabric, true to size relaxed fit. Great value for the price!

I am 5'6, 120 lbs. and ordered the Aleumdr set in a Small.  It has a baggy fit to it which makes it a great lounge set for home.  It surprised me how incredibly thick and warm this set is to wear.  I am going to love using this set during the winter months when I am always freezing.The sweatshirt is a zip up and has the front pocket pass through.  The wide leg pants do have pockets which is an almost must in my opinion.  I do not like pants without pockets.The listing care instructions state to "Hand wash only" which seems odd to me for a lounge set made of 50% polyester and 50% cotton.  The tags do say to machine wash warm but not to tumble dry.

This lounge set is PERFECT for relaxing around the house. Soft and comfortable. warm but not HOT, like a midweight sweater. Presentable, also, so you could run to the store if you needed to. Got a small and it fit perfectly. I like to keep the house cool, especially during the evening/night and I like to sit up and read some before bed. This is a great set to relax in right before bed. I wouldn't wear them as pajamas, I think you'd certainly MELT under a blanket, but sitting on the couch in the dark/cold is delightful. A bit pricey at $43, although not terrible for a full set. 30% off coupon at the moment, which makes it a MUCH better deal.
Very warm, comfortable and fits well!

评论概述: Fits perfectly, not too heavy, but warm
评论详情: These are perfect for lounging around in the house during winter or running to the post office or store.  For reference, I am 5'4", weighing 127 lbs. I got a large because I like my sweat clothes to fit a little bit loose, especially the top, since I frequently am wearing something underneath. As you can see in the photo, these fit perfectly. The legs are just a tad bit too long for me if I'm barefoot, but in winter, I won't be barefoot.  They are also the perfect weight... not too heavy, not too lightweight.  I highly recommend.
fit to size and very comfortable, good material like the style
SUPER SOFT and comfortable! Love the not cinched bottoms

I'm so cozy in this 2-piece lounge set! The half zip sweatshirt and sweatpants are made of soft material and have a great fit. I love that the set is matching - it makes for a stylish and put-together look even when I'm just lounging around. The half zip detail on the sweatshirt adds a cute touch and makes it easy to layer. The sweatpants are comfortable and have an elastic waistband that fits perfectly. This set is perfect for a relaxing day at home or running errands. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish loungewear set! (5/5 stars)

This matching lounge set is incredibly thick and cozy, making it perfect for a cold winter night. The cream color is lovely, and the 3/4 silver zipper with a circle pull adds a classy touch. The outfit is true to size with a comfortable, straight legged, loose fit. As someone on the taller side, I am pleased with the length. The stitching is well-done, and the overall quality is excellent.
This is so soft and comfortable. I ordered large but should have got medium. I’m 5’2 and about 155lbs. This is my husband wearing. I think he is stealing from me because so comfortable! Great set!

评论概述: Good for Lounging or Working Out.
评论详情: My wife really likes this set. It is very attractive and includes a quarter-zip top with a front pass-through pocket, and the matching elastic waist pants also have two front pockets. The material (50/50 cotton/poly) is very soft and both pieces are fleece lined for comfort and warmth. It could be equally useful wearing while jogging or walking, to the gym for a workout, or for lounging around the house on a chilly evening. Very nice set.

The inside is so so soft! I love the way the Medium fits me. I'm 5'6 150 pounds. The pants are high waisted. I love the strip down the front of the pants. The half zip top is so cute! This will be my go to warm outfit this winter! Great quality!
Love this outfit, very comfy and fit well.
Comfortable, and Cute. This suit is very flattering. I love how the material feels
Great for fall and winter

This outfit is cute and comfortable. It fits true to size. It's perfect for running errands or just lounging around the house. The color is more like coral than pink. The material is very soft. This outfit will get a lot of wear this fall.
Great quality, nice and warm!  Wide leg pants with pockets, and half zip shirt.  Perfect for lounging in the winter, although it does run large.
Nice fitting sweatsuit, but the  material is thick. It’s really warm great for cold winter days. It washed and dried well without any noticeable shrinkage.

This sweatsuit is super comfortable and is very well made. It is thick and warm and looks so cute on. The size is true to fit and I love the neutral color with my white sneakers. Great price too!  Add to cart!

评论概述: I love this jogger set but……would not recommend the army green color
评论详情: This set is very soft and thick. Great for cold weather. But after washing this particular color (army green)it fades and leaves spots of rust color. I was so disappointed. Wish I could send it back for a refund ☹️

This track suit is very very comfortable. Fit me perfectly and doesn't make me feel too pudgy. I Love the fleece lining and it stretches in all the right places. I can wear it out with shoes and with boots or heels. Just a great outfit to have for fall and winter.

Got this from my team who loves running around and sweatpants and hoodies or sweatshirts. This definitely fit the bill. There was enough room. She probably could’ve downsize, but it was very comfortable to her.  I like the sweater zip top. It kind of made it look a little more elevated than just a standard sweat shirt.  In my opinion, this will be good for traveling or every day lounging.

OMG! So soft, cozy, thick cotton, and long!!!! No drawstring but you don’t really need one with these. They fit soooo good. I got an XL because I was scared out might shrink in the dryer. Yeah I’m not handwashing this lol. I always just size up if there as washing restrictions. Perfectly fine if it doesn’t because I love baggy sweats. I feel like I could have gotten a medium even (assuming no shrinkage).  I’ll be testing the wash/dry soon… keep you posted!
Good quality fabric, fits well, looks good. Zipper is also good quality.
Super !
Absolutely LOVE, LOVE! I’m 5’2 and this fits perfectly! Length of pants is perfect, top is great. Fantastic quality, ordered green, blue and black. True to size.
Very comfy and true to size
